PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06542022-06-10ECCC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Wildlife Act
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wildlife Area Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATIONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish the Big Glace Bay Lake National Wildlife Area; (2) allow certain activities which are otherwise prohibited under general prohibitions; and (3) correct three administrative errors.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0135 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment

subject: Regulations Amending the Wildlife Area Regulations and the Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS and the ENVIRONMENTAL VIOLATIONS ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish the Big Glace Bay Lake National Wildlife Area; (2) allow certain activities which are otherwise prohibited under general prohibitions; and (3) correct three administrative errors.
